COMMIT.MESSAGE: don't include the "main" file by default It's not correct to forcefully include the file specified in "main" at upload-time. Consider an `npm run build` script that ends up creating the file that "main" specifies. It would not exist until inside the deployment, after the build script is ran for that deployment. Fixes https://github.com/zeit/now-cli/issues/281.
